categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Chancellor Valorum's shuttle was a sleek Eddicus-class planetary shuttle used by Supreme Chancellor Finis Valorum on Coruscant.
The shuttle's hull was painted blue with white stripes, as were all shuttles assigned to the Chancellor's office.

The shuttle was designed by Kuat Systems Engineering. In 32 BBY, during the Invasion of Naboo, Valorum traveled in his shuttle to greet Queen Amidala as she arrived at the Senate Building on Coruscant to ask for Republic assistance. It was also used to transport the Queen and her entourage just before she left Coruscant.
The shuttle was designed by Jay Shuster, who only identified it as a "troop transport."
